name: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! Kizuna No Tag Battle
name_original: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! Kizuna No Tag Battle
description:
A 3D fighting game where you battle in tag teams.
Katekyoo Hitman Reborn! Kizuna no Tag Battle is an Action game, developed by Shade and published by Marvelous Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 2010.
